ModMetaData.name: Extended Human Body Simulation
ModMetaData.author: Mythos
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new body parts: - Patella - Fibula - Ulna - Spleen - 2 lobes of liver (instead of one single organ) - Intestines (hidden, has 50% of a pawns metabolism stats) - Artificial bones to replace missing ones can be bought from traders
Credits and Thanks to... - PhileasFogg for the original mod! - Ykara, for his/her both fantastic mods, which I used as a basis for this mod: "EPOE (Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering)" and "Harvest Everything!" - Marnador, for the RimWor(l)d font, used in the picture above. - Tynan, for this great game!
